description: Public notice indicating contract award notice for lab freeze dryers and accessories
full_summary:
================================================(())
### Contract Award Notice

#### Project Title

* French: **Préavis d'attribution du contrat - Lyophilisateur VirTis G25EL**
* English: **ACAN 01550-240442 - VirTis G25EL Freeze Dryer**

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4207598607-DOC4267779933
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-10T14:00:00

#### Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award a contract for the supply of a VirTis G25EL freeze dryer to the pre-identified supplier, [Supplier Name] (name withheld for confidentiality).

#### Contract Status

* **Status**: Expired (Note: The tender is closed and the award process has been completed.)

#### Scope of Work

The contract is for the supply of a VirTis G25EL freeze dryer, a laboratory freeze dryer and lyophilizer, to meet the requirements of the end-user entities, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

#### Options and Approvals

The procurement is covered under the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and any orders or deliveries above the threshold may be subject to additional approvals.

#### Contact Information

To express interest or request further information, kindly contact Samantha Phelan at samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, or visit the [Contract Award Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17773387).

#### Terms and Condition

This notice is subject to the applicable terms and conditions outlined in the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN). Failure to meet the stated requirements may result in the award of the contract to the pre-identified supplier. Suppliers are advised to carefully review the requirements before submitting a statement of capabilities.

Note: As this is an Advance Contract Award Notice, other suppliers may submit a statement of capabilities to express their interest in bidding before the closing date stated in the announcement. If no supplier meets the requirements, the contract may be awarded to the pre-identified supplier. [4] 400
